Configuration.Name: Google Combined
Configuration.Author: IDS Project
Configuration.Description: Search Google Scholar, Google Books and Google.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: WhichGoogle
Setting.Description: Determines which Google should be searched automatically. The options at Books, Scholar, and Standard.

Setting.name: Article
Setting.Description: Determines if Scholar should be selected for Articles and Books for books. Will override WhichGoogle setting if either Books or Scholar is chosen.
